name: Maguu Kenki
desc:
"Ingenious Machine" Maguu Kenki

Even today, it still patrols the place where fate was severed.

desc.text:
<color=#ffd780>Elemental Burst</color>
Deals 4 <color=#80ffd7>Anemo DMG</color> , triggers the effect(s) of all your <color=#ffffff>Shadowsword</color> Summon(s). (Does not consume their Usages)

Reacts with Elements if they are already applied:
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Cryo Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Cryo DMG to all opposing chracters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Hydro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Hydro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Pyro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Pyro DMG to all opposing characters except the target
[ <color=#80ffd7>Anemo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> ] <color=#ffffff>Electro Swirl</color> : Deals 1 Electro DMG to all opposing characters except the target

Applies Cryo and can trigger the following Elemental Reactions:
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ff9999>Pyro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Melt</color> : DMG +2 for this instance
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#ffacff>Electro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Superconduct</color> : DMG+1 for this instance, deal 1 Piercing DMG to all opposing characters except the target
<color=#ffffff>[</color> <color=#99ffff>Cryo</color> + <color=#80c0ff>Hydro</color> <color=#ffffff>]</color> <color=#ffffff>Frozen</color> : DMG +1 for this instance, the target is unable to perform any Actions this Round (Can be removed in advance after the target receives Physical or Pyro DMG, in which case they will take +2 DMG)

<color=#ece5d8>Physical DMG</color>
Physical DMG will not apply any Elements, nor can it engage in Elemental Reactions.
<color=#ece5d8>Usage(s)</color>
After this card's effect is triggered, 1 <color=#ffffff>Usage</color> of it will be consumed.
This card will be discarded immediately once it has 0 <color=#ffffff>Usages</color> remaining.

value.name: Transcendent Automaton
value.desc:
Marionette Swordmaster

That unerring strike has been delivered countless times.

value.text: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge at The Cat's Tail and claiming victory in a Friendly Fracas with Maguu Kenki

value.name: Maguu Kenki
value.desc:
An disciplined mechanical swordsman.
Doesn't seem to have the ability nor will to speak, but instead only seeks to communicate with crossed swords.
It is said that this machine was made using the memories of the first-generation master of a certain sword school. However, it malfunctioned, lost control, and was ultimately discarded.
Some sing that the machine's spirit still lingers in the place where its fate was ended. They also say that the vicious mask that serves as its guard was inspired by a famous oni from that era.

customize.name: Maguu Kenki
customize.desc:
"Ingenious Machine" Maguu Kenki

Even today, it still patrols the place where fate was severed.

customize.name: Lucky Coin
customize.desc: Currency verified and used by the Genius Invokation TCG Society. Can be used to purchase various items related to Genius Invokation TCG. It is said that these coins were initially named as such in the hopes that they would bring those carrying them luck. However, perhaps it is those who are sufficiently lucky who are able to possess them...

customize.text: Can also be exchanged using a

customize.name: Blank Dynamic Card
customize.desc: A blank card with a painted back. It is said that if you put the name of your desired dynamic card on this blank card, you can get the very skin from the Association agent located at the tavern.

customize.text: Tavern Challenge: Friendly Fracas - Maguu Kenki's Origin

<color=#ffd780>Stage Introduction</color>
"Meow..." "A long, long time ago, a cat hiding in a ship from Inazuma told me that the nation was home to a sort of marionette blademaster..."
<color=#ccbfad>Special Rule: "Maguu Kenki" is immune to Frozen, Stun, and Petrification, and starts with the Talent Card "Transcendent Automaton" equipped</color>
<color=#ffffffd9>Opposing Lineup</color>
